Module fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner
Package fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner

Class AppState

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.AppState
public class AppState extends Object
Helper class for application state-related features.
Author:
janii, kian, Copilot
